newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil Oct Treasury deficit seen at 1.6 bln reais.
newsitem.headline: Brazil Oct Treasury deficit seen at 1.6 bln reais.

text.p: Brazil's National Treasury deficit topped 1.6 billion reais according to the cash concept in the month of October, a local newspaper said on Thursday.

Gazeta Mercantil said the deficit was due to payment of 1.4 billion reais in foreign debt interest and a transfer of 500 million reais to states to cover losses with the elimination of the so-called ICMS tax levied by state governments on exports of primary and semi-manufactured goods.
In September, the Treasury posted a 408 million real deficit, bringing the deficit for the year to 5.372 billion reais. -- Fatima Cristina, Sao Paulo Newsroom, 55-11-2485412
